text: On Aug. 10, 2022, U.S. President Joe Biden stated that the rate of inflation in July 2022 was zero percent.

text: Thanks to the insane tax-and-spending spree of President Joe Biden and Democrats in Washington, we are seeing six straight months of raging inflation.
Joe Biden inherited inflation of 1.7%. Now we're well over 8% and growing.
